alert.note: Alert for Lake; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 9:39PM EDT until March 31 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Porter County in northwestern Indiana... Lake County in northwestern Indiana... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 839 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near South Shore to Ford Heights to near Peotone, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Hammond, East Chicago, Schererville, Highland, Munster, Dyer, St. John and Whiting around 845 PM CDT. Merrillville, Crown Point and Griffith around 850 PM CDT. Gary, Lake Station and New Chicago around 855 PM CDT. Hobart, Cedar Lake, Lowell, Lake Dalecarlia and Ogden Dunes around 900 PM CDT. Portage, Valparaiso, Chesterton, South Haven and Burns Harbor around 905 PM CDT. Hebron, Lakes of the Four Seasons, Porter, Winfield and Beverly Shores around 910 PM CDT. Kouts around 920 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern Illinois...and northwestern Indiana.
